title: Trump, Chappelle, Necessary Romance, R. Kelly and more.
itunes:title: Trump, Chappelle, Necessary Romance, R. Kelly and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Just for the haters, he lays it out. 10-10-21! The CLO has a discussion that includes Popeye's and Kim from the Chinese restaurant along with a little bit of RW baby. NETFLIX stands behind the man whose numbers tell the real truth. 45 wants to MAGAA. Gruden steps down. Steve has a for sure way to get a huge ROI. Streams went up for Robert to say the least. The door is open for a guest and Big Dog approves. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog points out the importance of mental imagery.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
